.cmx-dropdown__wrapper.cmx-dropdown__rtl,:host.cmx-input .cmx-dropdown__wrapper.cmx-dropdown__rtl:hover{background-position:1% 55%}:host.cmx-input .cmx-dropdown__wrapper:hover{outline:0 6-6-6z'></path></svg>");background-position:99% 55%;background-repeat:no-repeat}.cmx-dropdown__placeholder{font-weight:500;color:#001B3A;font-size:30px;line-height:30px;cursor:pointer}.cmx-dropdown__items-positioner{z-index:11;position:absolute;top:100%;min-width:100%;width:auto;border-top:3px solid #3FA9F5;border-radius:3px;background:#fff;border-radius:3px;box-shadow:0 8px 13px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);-webkit-box-shadow:0 8px 13px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);-moz-box-shadow:0 8px 13px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box}.dropdown-items{overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden}.cmx-dropdown__mask{z-index:10;opacity:0;background:none;position:fixed;width:100vw;height:100vh;top:0;left:0;display:block;cursor:default}.filtering-box{background:#fff}.filtering-box .filter-search{border-bottom:1px solid #dadada;margin:0 15px;min-width:200px}.filtering-box .filter-search span{display:inline-block;width:22px;float:left}.filtering-box .filter-search span svg#icon-magnifier-glass{fill:#3FA9F5;width:14px;margin:13px 14px 3px 2px}.filtering-box .filter-search input[type="search"]{border:0;width:calc(100% - 24px);display:inline-block;height:48px;line-height:48px;font-size:.875rem}.filtering-box .filter-search input[type="search"]:focus{outline:0 none}.cmx-dropdown__rtl .filtering-box .filter-search span{float:right}.cmx-dropdown__rtl .filtering-box .filter-search span svg#icon-magnifier-glass{margin:13px 2px 3px 14px}
arguments.template: {{ _placeholder }}
